issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I've now confirmed this to be reproducible. The issue is that on a running cloud if you try to restart the eucalyptus-cloud service it will not be able to come back. It constantly loops trying to start. Looking at cloud-output.log there seems to be some permission denied error for accessing the config from the db?

{code}
2016-05-11 08:29:59 FATAL | java.io.FileNotFoundException: /var/run/eucalyptus/db/eucalyptus_config.cfg.sha256 (Permission denied)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: /var/run/eucalyptus/db/eucalyptus_config.cfg.sha256 (Permission denied)
{code}

Bigger snippet
{code}

Topology:
VPCMIDO
CentOS7
EQS default

To reproduce:
# Deploy a VPC mode cloud from EQS (no need to run any test list)
# After the cloud is deployed modify euca-conf with CLOUD_OPTS=""-Xmx2g""
# restart eucalyptus-cloud service on the CLC

comments.body:
[~sjones], the file does not exist and the db dir is empty. it's like a restart nuked it or something? The CLC is 10.111.5.1 if you'd like to look.

{code}
[root@h-01 ~]# ls -alF /var/run/eucalyptus/db/
total 0
drwxr-xr-x. 2 root       root        40 May 10 23:13 ./
drwxr-xr-x. 7 eucalyptus eucalyptus 220 May 11 10:29 ../
{code]

The permissions/ownership for some directories are not set on startup, the expected directories are checked:

{code}
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [Bootstrap:main] ================================================================================
Bootstrap stage: UnprivilegedConfiguration.load()
================================================================================
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [Bootstrap:main] :1462991222769:Bootstrap:bootstrap:BOOTSTRAPPER_LOAD:UnprivilegedConfiguration:com.eucalyptus.system.DirectoryBootstrapper
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222769:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:HOME://
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:VAR:///var/lib/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:CONF:///etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:LIB:///usr/share/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:LOG:///var/log/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:RUN:///var/run/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:LIBEXEC:///usr/lib/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:STATE:///var/lib/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:JNI:///usr/lib/eucalyptus
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222770:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:SYSFAULTS:///usr/share/eucalyptus/faults
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222771:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:CUSTOMFAULTS:////etc/eucalyptus/faults
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222771:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:DB:///var/lib/eucalyptus/db
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222827:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:BACKUPS:///var/lib/eucalyptus/backups
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222844:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:TX:///var/run/eucalyptus//tx
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222859:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:CLASSCACHE:///var/run/eucalyptus//classcache
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222918:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:KEYS:///var/lib/eucalyptus/keys
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222931:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:SCRIPTS:///etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/scripts
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222931:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:MANAGEMENT:///etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/jmx
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222931:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:STATUS:///var/run/eucalyptus/status
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222935:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:UPGRADE:///var/lib/eucalyptus/upgrade
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222940:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:QUEUE:///var/lib/eucalyptus/queue
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222945:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:LIB:///usr/share/eucalyptus/
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [DirectoryBootstrapper:main] :1462991222945:DirectoryBootstrapper:bootstrap:SYSTEM_DIR_CHECK:RUNDB:///var/run/eucalyptus//db
Wed May 11 11:27:02 2016  INFO [Bootstrap:main] :1462991222952:Bootstrap:bootstrap:BOOTSTRAPPER_LOAD:UnprivilegedConfiguration:com.eucalyptus.ws.server.Pipelines.PipelineBootstrapper
{code}

but the result is not as expected:

{code}
# ll /var/run/eucalyptus/
total 12
drwxr-xr-x. 4 root       root               140 May 10 23:12 classcache
drwxr-xr-x. 2 root       root                40 May 10 23:13 db
-rw-r--r--. 1 root       root                 4 May 10 23:12 eucalyptus-cluster.pid
-rw-r--r--. 1 root       root                 5 May 10 23:12 eucanetd.pid
-rw-r--r--. 1 root       root              1588 May 10 23:12 httpd-cc.conf
drwxrwxr-x. 2 eucalyptus dhcpd               40 May 10 23:12 net
drwxr-xr-x. 2 eucalyptus eucalyptus-status   40 May 10 23:12 status
drwx------. 2 root       root                40 May 10 23:13 tx
{code}

so permission is denied when creating a file under "db"

For rhel/centos 7 we are not passing the user option to eucalyptus-cloud which causes the ownership changes to files to fail. We are not correctly using the default user ("eucalyptus") when setting file permissions.
We now use the "eucalyptus" user for file ownership when a user is not specified.

Fix Verified.
Correct directory permissions are in place. Cloud restarts are working

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.3.0
Release     : 0.24955.305.20160606git455d10d.el6

{code}
[root@b-25 ~]#  ll /var/run/eucalyptus/

-rw-r--r--   1 root       root           6 Jun  7 08:47 nginx_localproxy.pid
